channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Livy (Incubating)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Livy (Incubating)

item.title: CVE-2021-26544|2024-08-03T20:26:25.283Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20livy%20%28incubating%29
item.description: Livy server version 0.7.0-incubating (only) is vulnerable to a cross site scripting issue in the session name. A malicious user could use this flaw to access logs and results of other users' sessions and run jobs with their privileges. This issue is fixed in Livy 0.7.1-incubating.
